name: Super Radical Am Skater: Airbourne
description:
Super Radical Am Skater (S.R.AM.S) is a 2d skateboarding game with an arcade-ish structure, go to a level and complete objectives to progress, the game currently supports keyboard and Xinput controllers, it also works with the Dualshock4, but it is recommended that you use DS4Windows when playing with Sony hardware.

Note: All the music in this game is royalty free/public domain, however if the artists/bands have a label change we will remove their songs and replace them with other public domain songs, this due to the game being YouTube friendly. 

System Requirements:

Minimum:

  • OS: Minimum Windows XP SP3 Operating System. Supports Vista, 7 , 8 and Windows 10.
  • Processor: 200 Mhz Pentium processor or higher.
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM.
  • Graphics: Must support minimum of Direct3D 9.

Recommended:

  • OS:  Windows 10.
  • Processor: Intel Core Series/Newer Pentium Processors.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM.
  • Graphics: Must Support DirectX11
